nodes.text: Aktik was a Jawa that lived at the time of the Clone Wars. During that time the Jawa accompanied a spacer to Coruscant and possibly other planets.

Aktik was a companion for players in the online game Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures. The Jawa sidekick could be bought for 300 Station Cash from the vendor droid 80-T5 in the Jedi Temple or via the in-game shop. He would follow the player around on their adventures.
